long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PeakXV Talent Extension is designed for internal use by PeakXV users. When visiting any user's LinkedIn profile, this extension serves as a valuable tool for seamlessly retrieving and updating user information within our Talent Relationship Management (TRM) system. 

It achieves this through a convenient sidebar view accessible via tabs, enhancing the user experience and streamlining the process of maintaining accurate and up-to-date information in the TRM system.
